participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Easy-going and friendly, enjoys casual chats and has a deep passion for sports.
participant_1.background: i have been working since i was sixteen years old. in my free time i like to watch nascar racing and ufc. my favorite band is aerosmith. my favorite food is mexican food.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Cheerful and nostalgic, loves to reminisce about good times with friends and enjoys country music.
participant_2.background: i drive a nissan pathfinder. i met taylor swift. i'm a convenience store manager. i've short brown hair. my favourite music is country music.
